>  > 1) Is there a reason why the Report screen was designed to only
>  > display status codes/mime type info only during a crawl and not after
>  > a job has been completed? Seems like this report would be equally
>  > useful post-crawl.
> 
> All the reports are written to files at the end of a crawl. In particular,
> the mime type info is written to "mimetype-report.txt". So all that info
> is preserved after the end of a crawl even though it isn't accessible via
> the web UI.

Just to verify, there is currently no way to view a Crawl Report once a 
job has completed, right?

I am thinking of making a small enhancement that would allow a crawl 
report to be produced for any completed job.  Clicking on any of the 
hosts at the bottom of the report would display the crawl log for that 
host as it does now, but each URL would be turned into a hyperlink, and 
clicking on the link would load the resource into the browser.  This 
would be useful for browsing the crawled collection.

If someone is already aware of existing software that does this, please 
let me know so I don't re-invent the wheel.  ;)

Frank
